Toyota x Japan

Collaboration Proposal

Oh hey Toyota.
Let's cruise around Japan together and make some magic.

We've got a vision.


We're a group of content creators heading on a press trip to Japan to explore an off-the-beaten path itinerary -- together we can turn it into an epic road trip.


For one week in March 2019, we would cruise around Japan in a Toyota car capturing photo & video content for your social media as well as promoting Toyota to our audiences.

Our crew

Our team is spearheaded by two best mates that take incredible pride in creating content that not only showcases the product, but tells a story. Behind them, is a full creative agency based here in Bali, that has the skills & team to plan, coordinate & execute this bold vision.

Emilio: An Australian living in Bali for the past 5 years working as a photographer/videographer for international fashion & lifestyle brands. He also runs a school in Bali that teaches photography & content creation to aspiring creatives from all over the world - now surpassing 500 students graduating from this immersive learning environment. He also has a highly engaged audience of 30,000 followers on Instagram & an email list of 50k

Cam: An American that fell in love with Bali, has called it home for past 3 years. Working as an adventure & lifestyle photographer/videographer working for brands & tourism boards all over the world creating stunning visuals & stories to match. His Instagram as amassed an audience of over 65,000 followers that's cant wait to follow his next big adventure.

Kelapa Creative: A full-service agency based in Bali, lead by Tina May, provides services from branding & design to comprehensive website builds & full campaign management -  from talent management, prop design & more. Our team consists of web devs, editors, copywriters, designers & marketing geniuses & most importantly for a project like this, a team of locals that GET SH*T DONE. 

Our crew is equiped with everything we need to create stunning visuals, from professional audio & lighting, to gimbals & monitors etc. We shoot Primarily Canon & have the lenses to showcase the beauty & versatility of the RF mount on the RED Komodo. With SCUBA divers in our team, will be looking to partner with @saltysurfhousings to take us underwater & our friends at La Lunia Liveaboard to get us to our destination on their luxurious wooden Phinisi dive boat.

The experience you need

As a collective we have worked car companies, local and international fashion & lifestyle brands, luxury villas and hotels, cafes and restaurants, tour companies and more. Our work has been featured by BBC, NY Times, CNN, Discovery and is re-shared by major instagram accounts like @artofvisuals and @moodygrams. 

Beyond working with brands, Cam has a long standing partnership with the Indonesian Tourism Board, giving us the ability to push the boundaries of what's possible when it comes to working in sensitive areas like the Komodo Islands. 

Being a part of a full-service creative agency, we have experience not just shooting content, but all the strategic direction, coordination, and production management needed to handle this project from start to finish.

From the streets of Tokyo to the slopes of Mt Fuji, we want to see it all in a Toyota rental car.

Our Pitch

We'll be exploring Japan for 1 week starting the 13th March and would love to do it in as a road trip. In exchange for providing a rental car for 1 week + fuel costs we could offer ...

  • 15x high resolution professionally edited photos
  • 1x 30 second video promotional video of the road trip
  • Mention in a minimum of 6 separate instagram stories on each persons instagram account (total 24 stories)
  • 2 dedicated instagram posts tagging @Toyota on each persons instagram account (total 8 posts)

Slide into my inbox

Keen to chat further? Send me an email and let's get the ball rolling.
